name: Hotel Glories

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Glories. This 3* hotel is a 3* hotel! Therefore you get what you pay for and as such we cannot complain.
reviews.title: Far from a 'disaster'

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lift - although small - is not offensive. Our room was spacious and clean. The staff were friendly, helpful and spoke good English. We did not opt for the breakfast. However, the supermarket and bakery next door provided adequate morning refreshment and convenient groceries.
reviews.title: Disaster
Were positive suprised
reviews.text: The location was ideal - walking distance from various tourist attractions, including beautiful beaches, Barcelona zoo, and Gaudi's Cathedral.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a city break in Barcelona.
reviews.title: Fantastic!!

reviews.text: This hotel is not suitable for a relaxing, romantic break as we had intended. The first problem was the lift - there was not enough room for me (small), my husband (tall,blocky) and 1 small suitcase - we had to squash in! We travelled downward to the basement area. Our room was tiny - a very small double bed pushed right up to the ensuite wall. There was a two foot aisle left in the room! The view from the window was diagonally opposite the neighbouring window and was surrounded by a triangular concrete tunnel - there was daylight somewhere at the top! Extremely dungeon like. The ensuite was long and very narrow - bath/shower way too small and quite grubby. The TV had no english channels. The breakfast room has no daylight at all and a very small breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Good overall value

likes.disliked: — A little out of the way of the centre

reviews.text: This hotel was recommended by a friend who'd stayed there previously and it did not disappoint. It was clean and comfortable and the location whist not exactly central was within easy reach of the tube station and just 10 mins stroll from the Sagrada Familia.
reviews.title: Good hote for a few nights stay

likes.liked: — It suited our purpose - a clean comfortable hotel in a good location which didnt break the bank.
likes.disliked: — the lighting in the bedroom was inadequate - day and nighttime.

description: Hotel Glories is located to 10 minutes from the Sagrada Familia, for the 22 high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away. Direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes. Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glories. The rooms all have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV , free Wi-Fi, 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire, reserve tickets.
